name: ANTON THE ALIEN
description: The ANTON THE ALIEN NFT collection is the utility NFT of the ANTON ecosystem, featuring a limited supply of just 2,100 NFTs. These masterpieces offer stunning artistry to the $ANTON ecosystem and also offers holders a range of exclusive utilities such as such as weekly staking rewards, guaranteed whitelist for next ANTON NFT collections, exclusive Airdrops and access to ANTON Governance.
